TextBlock.Text: Laeliin: The Chapada Planetary Park is located in the Diamantine system.
Laeliin: It encompasses the whole of Diamantine III, a planet of lush forests.
Laeliin: As such, it is also home to a great number of species, such as the swift-tongue toad, the bald aligator, or the famous blue-bellied horned bukrad.
Laeliin: The bald aligator shouldn't be mistaken for the shaved crocodile, which is a completely different species.
Laeliin: The latter - as any respectable biologist would know - is a four-legged creature whose diet consist primarily of kelp.
